exams.name: Microsoft Azure Fundamentals (AZ-900)
exams.description: Covers basic cloud concepts, Azure services, security, privacy, compliance, and trust.

exams.name: Microsoft Azure Data Fundamentals (DP-900)
exams.description: Focuses on core database concepts in a cloud environment and basic skills in Azure data services.

exams.name: Microsoft Azure AI Fundamentals (AI-900)
exams.description: Introduces artificial intelligence (AI) concepts and related Azure services.

exams.name: Microsoft Security, Compliance, and Identity Fundamentals (SC-900)
exams.description: Provides a broad overview of security, compliance, and identity concepts and related Microsoft solutions.

exams.name: Microsoft Power Platform Fundamentals (PL-900)
exams.description: Introduces the capabilities of the Microsoft Power Platform.

exams.name: Microsoft 365 Fundamentals (MS-900)
exams.description: Covers the benefits and considerations of adopting cloud services and Microsoft 365.

exams.name: Microsoft Dynamics 365 Fundamentals (CRM) (MB-910)
exams.description: Provides a broad introduction to the customer engagement apps of Dynamics 365.

exams.name: Microsoft Dynamics 365 Fundamentals (ERP) (MB-920)
exams.description: Introduces the finance and operations capabilities of Dynamics 365.

exams.name: Microsoft Azure Administrator Associate (AZ-104)
exams.description: For professionals who implement, manage, and monitor an organization’s Microsoft Azure environment.

exams.name: Microsoft Azure Developer Associate (AZ-204)
exams.description: For developers who design, build, test, and maintain cloud solutions on Microsoft Azure.

exams.name: Microsoft Azure Security Engineer Associate (AZ-500)
exams.description: For security engineers who implement, manage, and monitor security and compliance solutions in Microsoft Azure.

exams.name: Microsoft Azure Data Engineer Associate (DP-203)
exams.description: For data engineers who design and implement data engineering solutions using Azure data services.

exams.name: Microsoft Power BI Data Analyst Associate (PL-300)
exams.description: For professionals who enable businesses to maximize the value of their data assets using Microsoft Power BI.

exams.name: Microsoft Dynamics 365 Sales Functional Consultant Associate (MB-210)
exams.description: Focuses on configuring and using Dynamics 365 Sales.

exams.name: Microsoft Dynamics 365 Customer Service Functional Consultant Associate (MB-230)
exams.description: Focuses on configuring and using Dynamics 365 Customer Service.

exams.name: Microsoft Dynamics 365 Field Service Functional Consultant Associate (MB-240)
exams.description: Focuses on configuring and using Dynamics 365 Field Service.

exams.name: Microsoft Dynamics 365 Finance Functional Consultant Associate (MB-310)
exams.description: Focuses on configuring and using Dynamics 365 Finance.

exams.name: Microsoft Dynamics 365 Supply Chain Management Functional Consultant Associate (MB-330)
exams.description: Focuses on configuring and using Dynamics 365 Supply Chain Management.

exams.name: Microsoft 365 Teams Administrator Associate (MS-700)
exams.description: For IT professionals who manage and configure Microsoft Teams environments.

exams.name: Microsoft 365 Security Administrator Associate (MS-500)
exams.description: For IT professionals who implement and manage security and compliance features in Microsoft 365.

exams.name: Microsoft Azure Solutions Architect Expert (AZ-305)
exams.description: For individuals with expertise in designing and implementing solutions on Microsoft Azure.

exams.name: Microsoft Azure DevOps Engineer Expert (AZ-400)
exams.description: For professionals who implement and manage DevOps practices in Azure.

exams.name: Microsoft 365 Enterprise Administrator Expert (MS-102)
exams.description: For IT professionals who manage and administer a Microsoft 365 environment.

exams.name: Microsoft Cybersecurity Architect Expert (SC-100)
exams.description: For experts in designing and evolving the cybersecurity strategy of an organization.

exams.name: Microsoft Azure Virtual Desktop Specialty (AZ-140)
exams.description: Focuses on the skills needed to plan, implement, and manage Azure Virtual Desktop environments.

exams.name: Microsoft Azure Cosmos DB Developer Specialty (DP-420)
exams.description: Validates skills in designing, implementing, and managing applications using Azure Cosmos DB.

exams.name: Microsoft Dynamics 365 Customer Insights (Data) Specialty (MB-260)
exams.description: Focuses on implementing and using Dynamics 365 Customer Insights (Data).

exams.name: AWS Certified Cloud Practitioner (CLF-C02)
exams.description: Provides a foundational understanding of AWS Cloud concepts and services.

exams.name: AWS Certified Solutions Architect – Associate (SAA-C03)
exams.description: Demonstrates the ability to design and deploy scalable, highly available, and fault-tolerant systems on AWS.

exams.name: AWS Certified Developer – Associate (DVA-C02)
exams.description: Validates the ability to develop, deploy, and debug cloud-based applications using AWS.

exams.name: AWS Certified SysOps Administrator – Associate (SOA-C02)
exams.description: Demonstrates skills in deploying, managing, and operating scalable and highly available systems on AWS.

exams.name: AWS Certified Data Engineer – Associate
exams.description: Validates expertise in key AWS data services and building data pipelines.

exams.name: AWS Certified Solutions Architect – Professional (SAP-C02)
exams.description: Demonstrates advanced skills in designing complex and scalable applications on AWS.

exams.name: AWS Certified DevOps Engineer – Professional (DOP-C02)
exams.description: Validates skills in provisioning, operating, and managing distributed application systems on AWS.

exams.name: AWS Certified Advanced Networking – Specialty (ANS-C01)
exams.description: Validates expertise in designing and implementing advanced AWS networking solutions.

exams.name: AWS Certified Security – Specialty (SCS-C01)
exams.description: Demonstrates expertise in securing the AWS environment and applications.

exams.name: AWS Certified Machine Learning – Specialty (MLS-C01)
exams.description: Validates skills in building, training, tuning, and deploying machine learning models on AWS.

exams.name: AWS Certified Data Analytics – Specialty (DAS-C01)
exams.description: Demonstrates expertise in using AWS data analytics services to design and build data lakes and analytics solutions.

exams.name: AWS Certified Database – Specialty (DBS-C01)
exams.description: Validates skills in designing, deploying, and migrating database workloads to AWS databases.

exams.name: AWS Certified SAP on AWS – Specialty (PAS-C01)
exams.description: Demonstrates expertise in deploying and managing SAP workloads on AWS.

exams.name: AWS Certified AI Practitioner – Foundational (Beta)
exams.description: Provides an overview of AI, ML, and generative AI concepts and AWS services.

exams.name: Associate Cloud Engineer
exams.description: For individuals who deploy, manage, and operate Google Cloud Platform implementations.

exams.name: Professional Cloud Architect
exams.description: For individuals who design, develop, and manage robust, secure, scalable, highly available, and dynamic solutions on Google Cloud.

exams.name: Professional Data Engineer
exams.description: For individuals who design, build, operationalize, secure, and monitor data processing systems with a particular emphasis on security and compliance; reliability and scalability; efficiency and cost-effectiveness; and data governance.

exams.name: Professional Cloud Developer
exams.description: For individuals who build and deploy applications on the Google Cloud Platform.

exams.name: Professional Cloud DevOps Engineer
exams.description: For individuals who implement and manage continuous delivery systems and methodologies on Google Cloud.

exams.name: Professional Cloud Network Engineer
exams.description: For individuals who implement and manage network architectures in Google Cloud.

exams.name: Professional Cloud Security Engineer
exams.description: For individuals who design and implement security infrastructure and processes on Google Cloud.

exams.name: Professional Collaboration Engineer
exams.description: For individuals who deploy, configure, and manage Google Workspace.

exams.name: Professional Machine Learning Engineer
exams.description: For individuals who design, build, and productionize ML models on Google Cloud.

exams.name: Professional Cloud Database Engineer
exams.description: For individuals who design, implement, and manage database solutions on Google Cloud.

exams.name: Professional Google Workspace Administrator
exams.description: For individuals who manage and administer Google Workspace environments.

exams.name: Cloud Digital Leader
exams.description: Demonstrates foundational knowledge of cloud concepts and Google Cloud.

exams.name: Associate Data Practitioner
exams.description: Demonstrates foundational skills in data analysis and the use of Google Cloud data tools.

exams.name: Professional ChromeOS Administrator
exams.description: For individuals who manage and deploy ChromeOS devices in an enterprise environment.

exams.name: ArchiMate® 3 Part 1 Exam
exams.description: Tests knowledge of the ArchiMate® 3 core language.

exams.name: ArchiMate® 3 Part 2 Exam
exams.description: Tests the ability to analyze and apply the ArchiMate® 3 language.

exams.name: Open Agile Architecture™ Practitioner Exam
exams.description: Tests knowledge and understanding of Open Agile Architecture concepts.

exams.name: DPBoK™ Part 1 Exam
exams.description: Tests foundational knowledge of the Data Professional Body of Knowledge.

exams.name: IT4IT™ Part 1 Exam
exams.description: Tests basic knowledge of the IT4IT™ Reference Architecture.

exams.name: IT4IT™ 3 Foundation Exam
exams.description: Tests foundational knowledge of the IT4IT™ Standard, Version 3.

exams.name: Open FAIR™ Part 1 Exam
exams.description: Tests foundational knowledge of the Open FAIR™ risk analysis standard.

exams.name: Open FAIR™ 2 Foundation Exam
exams.description: Tests foundational knowledge of the Open FAIR™ Body of Knowledge.

exams.name: TOGAF® Enterprise Architecture Part 1 Exam
exams.description: Tests basic knowledge and understanding of the TOGAF® Standard, 10th Edition.

exams.name: TOGAF® Enterprise Architecture Part 2 Exam
exams.description: Tests the ability to apply the TOGAF® Standard, 10th Edition.

exams.name: TOGAF® Enterprise Architecture Bridge Exam
exams.description: For TOGAF® 9 Certified individuals to become TOGAF® Enterprise Architecture Practitioner certified (based on 10th Edition).

exams.name: TOGAF® Enterprise Architecture Combined Part 1 and Part 2 Exam
exams.description: Tests both basic knowledge and application of the TOGAF® Standard, 10th Edition.

exams.name: TOGAF® Business Architecture Foundation Exam
exams.description: Tests basic knowledge and understanding of Business Architecture and its alignment with TOGAF® Standard, 10th Edition.

exams.name: TOGAF® 9 Part 1 Exam
exams.description: Tests basic knowledge and understanding of TOGAF® 9.

exams.name: TOGAF® 9 Part 2 Exam
exams.description: Tests the ability to analyze and apply TOGAF® 9.

exams.name: TOGAF® 9 Combined Part 1 and Part 2 Exam
exams.description: Tests both basic knowledge and application of TOGAF® 9.

exams.name: TOGAF® Business Architecture Part 1 Exam
exams.description: Tests basic knowledge of TOGAF® 9 for Business Architecture.
